actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-334.

official_title: Resolution waiving points of order against the bill H.R. 8917.  A bill making appropriations for the Department of the Interior and related agencies for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that during the consideration of the bill (H.R. 8917) making appropriations for the Department of the Interior and related agencies for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, and for other purposes, all points of order against said bill for failure to comply with the provisions of clause 2, rule XXI are hereby waived.

titles.title: Resolution waiving points of order against the bill H.R. 8917.  A bill making appropriations for the Department of the Interior and related agencies for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, and for other purposes.
